Job Description: What You'll Do:Write simple, efficient, and maintainable code.Solid grip on the programming basics like DS and algorithms.Meeting with the software development team to discuss project definitions and goals.Designing system integrations and project workflows.Writing clean, scalable Java code.Designing software database architecture.Developing Java-based user interfaces.Prioritizing and distributing development tasks.Validating the functionality and security of the application.Experience with as many of the following tech: Java, sprintboot, MySql, Redis, AWS, will be preferred.Experience and interests in IoT, ML and AI, will be an advantage.Using coding standards and best practices to ensure quality.What Makes You A Great Fit:2-4 years of experience in backend engineer, software or JAVA design and architect.Previous experience working as a Java Software Engineer, Java Architect, or Java Developer.Excellent knowledge of web services.Sound knowledge of Java technologies.Detailed knowledge of software architecture and user interfaces.Experience with software design and application programming.Prior experience in start-ups or health-tech will be a plusPerks and Benefits Flexible work hours Health care benefits
